events.message: I received my order yesterday, but the product is not what I expected and I want to request a refund as soon as possible.
The customer's message mentions refund requests, so this case is categorized under Refund for appropriate handling.
An available agent has been assigned to handle this refund case to ensure timely resolution.
Hello! Thank you for contacting us. I understand you'd like to request a refund for your recent order. Iâ€™m here to help.
Could you please provide your order number and the reason for the refund so I can process your request efficiently?
Sure, my order number is 123456789. The item is different from what was shown on the website, and I would prefer a refund.
Thank you for the information. I have submitted your refund request. You can expect the refund to be processed within 5 to 7 business days.
Thanks for the update. I appreciate the quick response and the clear timeline for my refund.
Your refund case is now resolved. If you have any further questions, feel free to contact us anytime.
We are following up to confirm that your refund has been processed and received. Please let us know if there are any issues.
As the refund has been confirmed processed and no further issues were reported, this case will now be closed. Thank you!
